sentence: We sat another ten minutes and finally gave up and left.

This sentiment is well-supported with a sentiment score of -0.8 and a high confidence rating of 0.9.

sentence: (The bathroom is just next door and very nice.)

sentence: Pretty cool I would say.

sentence: Definitely a turn off for me & i doubt I'll be back unless someone else is buying.

sentence: Would come back again if I had a sushi craving while in Vegas.
